OPPER CASTLE (SHORT & SWEET)
We offer high-end home technology systems in the Dallas / Ft. Worth Metroplex. All of our business has come from customer referrals and local partnerships. 
WHAT WE OFFER (SERVICES)
Our full list of services is long, but our primary services are home automation systems, smart lighting/dimming, TV installation, home theater systems featuring digital projection and surround sound, reliable home networks with strong WiFi and more. 
INTEGRATED TECH
It used to be the case that an "audio/video" guy only needed to know about audio and video, but those days are gone. All home systems today are becoming interconnected using a growing mass of different communication technologies using different standards and communication methods. Our technicians are cross trained in all of the different technologies so that we can design and install systems that push the boundaries in terms of capability and offer the highest value. Our technicians are skilled in the areas of audio/video, automation, networking, wireless distribution, electrical, led lighting, HVAC(nest) and the web technologies like coding and graphic design. Rest assured that we can have the staff and the knowledge to handle your needs(dreams?) in an efficient and educated manor.
THE PROCESS
See what it is like to work with a designer, instead of a salesman. Getting started is easy. We offer a free in-home estimate, but it is really much more than that. We will come out to your home and discuss the service that you are looking for. We will make recommendations for alterations or tweaks that can enhance functionality and/or reduce the overall cost. Your estimate will be built showing the cost of each item so that revisions will be simple to make and easy to understand. We can start on your project within a week / two week time frame in most cases.
